Name: Odd||Even
About the game: Odd||Even is a math and logic based, integer placement puzzle game created by irritatingFLY studio. Oddeven-game Features powerful puzzle generator with natural interface feature rich mathematical-software full control given to users sharp graphics 4k ready 90 logical selected puzzles full rights (once purchased you can use generated puzzles as you like, even for commercial use)
